title: What Your Paper-Covered, Lunch-Littered Desk Says About You
itunes:title: What Your Paper-Covered, Lunch-Littered Desk Says About You
description:
This week SuChin is reckoning with the state of her desk (read: messy), while Kulap’s long awaited health reckoning (first mentioned in episode one) has finally arrived, Bala bangles included. Luckily, the recent listener DM’s, questions and suggestions bring all the laughs necessary to face the week’s scaries. 

 

Please note, Add To Cart contains mature themes and may not be appropriate for all listeners. 

 

For a list and links to all products mentioned in this episode, head to @addtocartpod on Instagram. 

 

Stay up to date with us on Twitter, Facebook, and Instagram at @LemonadaMedia. 

 

Click this link for a list of current sponsors and discount codes for this show and all Lemonada shows: Sponsor Links
